We handle all paperwork, permitting with Enfield building department, utility interconnection, and incentive applications. Join the energy revolution and take control of your Enfield home's power with professional battery storage installation.

faq.question: How long will a solar battery power my Enfield home during an outage?
faq.answer: Battery backup duration depends on your Enfield home's energy consumption and battery capacity. A single Tesla Powerwall (13.5 kWh) can power essential circuits (refrigerator, lights, WiFi, phone chargers) for 24+ hours, or your whole home for 8-12 hours depending on usage. With solar panels, the battery recharges daily, providing indefinite backup. For whole-home backup in Enfield, most homes need 2-3 Powerwalls. We'll design a system sized perfectly for your needs.
